name: Man please last 10 seconds
description:
A 10 second game made by harristsui and pumibless

Survive the barrage of dangerous particles from training bots!                                           

Use A & D and Left-Arrow & Right-Arrow keys to move

...

The name of this game was inspired by a very famous person [Harvard research approved]:

Mini playtest

         -        David:

                                - Time bar

                                 - Title: "if you're a grown up man, last ten seconds." [ty david]

..........DON'T CRY IF YOU COULDN'T MAKE IT.......
